# worldbet: Convert WorldBet to IPA

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library("worldbet")

# that
convert_bet_to_ipa("D@t")

# uh-oh
convert_bet_to_ipa("^?o")

# still working on diacritics though
convert_bet_to_ipa("wA)&_r")

```
